languages.text: Когда новость об измене Вольного Торговца достигла обитаемых систем, Флоту выпала мрачная обязанность свершить кару над протекторатом. Именно они разгромили флот на орбите Даргонуса и свершили очистительную бомбардировку столичного мира. По всему Простору патрули охотились на корабли, несущие некогда славный символ фон Валанциусов.

When the news of the Rogue Trader's betrayal reached the inhabited systems, it was the Navy's grim duty to exact retribution on the protectorate. It was they who defeated the fleet in Dargonus's orbit and carried out the purge of the capital world. All across the Expanse, patrols hunted for the ships bearing the once glorious crest of von Valancius.
languages.original_text: Когда новость об измене Вольного Торговца достигла обитаемых систем, Флоту выпала мрачная обязанность свершить кару над протекторатом. Именно они разгромили флот на орбите Даргонуса и свершили очистительную бомбардировку столичного мира. По всему Простору патрули охотились на корабли, несущие некогда славный символ фон Валанциусов.

traits.locale_text: When the news of the Rogue Trader's betrayal reached the inhabited systems, it was the Fleet's grim duty to exact retribution on the protectorate. It was they who defeated the fleet in Dargonus' orbit and carried out the purge of the capital world. All across the Expanse, patrols hunted for the ships bearing the once glorious crest of the von Valancius.

It was they who defeated the fleet in Dargonus's orbit and carried out the purge of the capital world. All across the Expanse, patrols hunted for the ships bearing the once glorious crest of von Valancius.

When the news of the Rogue Trader's betrayal reached the inhabited systems, it was the Navy's grim duty to exact retribution on the protectorate. It was they who defeated the fleet in Dargonus's orbit and carried out the purge of the capital world. All across the Expanse, patrols hunted for the ships bearing the once glorious crest of von Valancius.

languages.text: 当行商浪人背叛帝国的消息传到有人居住的星系时，帝国海军肩负起了严峻的职责，负责对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝进行清洗。他们消灭了达戈努斯轨道上的王朝舰队，对整个首都世界进行了清洗。在那之后，帝国海军派出了巡逻队，负责在整个科罗努斯扩区狩猎带有冯·瓦兰修斯家族纹章的舰船。
languages.original_text: When the news of the Rogue Trader's betrayal reached the inhabited systems, it was the Navy's grim duty to exact retribution on the protectorate. It was they who defeated the fleet in Dargonus's orbit and carried out the purge of the capital world. All across the Expanse, patrols hunted for the ships bearing the once glorious crest of von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: 当行商浪人背叛帝国的消息传到有人居住的星系时，帝国海军肩负起了严峻的职责，负责对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝进行清洗。他们消灭了达戈努斯轨道上的王朝舰队，对整个首都世界进行了清洗。在那之后，帝国海军派出了巡逻队，负责在整个科罗努斯扩区狩猎带有冯·瓦兰修斯家族纹章的舰船。

languages.text: 自由開拓者が裏切ったというニュースが居住星系に届いた時、その保護領に懲罰を与えるのは海軍の務めだった。ダルゴナスの軌道でその艦隊を打ち負かし、首都惑星の粛清を遂行したのも海軍だった。エクスパンスの全域で、パトロール隊がかつては偉大であったフォン・ヴァランシウスの家紋を掲げた船を捜索した。
languages.original_text: When the news of the Rogue Trader's betrayal reached the inhabited systems, it was the Navy's grim duty to exact retribution on the protectorate. It was they who defeated the fleet in Dargonus's orbit and carried out the purge of the capital world. All across the Expanse, patrols hunted for the ships bearing the once glorious crest of von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者が裏切ったというニュースが居住星系に届いた時、その保護領に懲罰を与えるのは海軍の務めだった。ダルゴナスの軌道でその艦隊を打ち負かし、首都惑星の粛清を遂行したのも海軍だった。エクスパンスの全域で、パトロール隊がかつては偉大であったフォン・ヴァランシウスの家紋を掲げた船を捜索した。

languages.text: Quand la nouvelle de la trahison {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} parvint dans les systèmes habités, la triste mission de châtier le protectorat revint à la Marine. Ce fut elle qui battit la flotte en orbite de Dargonus et procéda à la purge du monde-capitale. À travers les Étendues, des patrouilles traquèrent les vaisseaux portant les armoiries autrefois glorieuses des von Valancius.
languages.original_text: When the news of the Rogue Trader's betrayal reached the inhabited systems, it was the Navy's grim duty to exact retribution on the protectorate. It was they who defeated the fleet in Dargonus's orbit and carried out the purge of the capital world. All across the Expanse, patrols hunted for the ships bearing the once glorious crest of von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: Quand la nouvelle de la trahison {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} parvint dans les systèmes habités, la triste mission de châtier le protectorat revint à la Marine. Ce fut elle qui battit la flotte en orbite de Dargonus et procéda à la purge du monde-capitale. À travers les Étendues, des patrouilles traquèrent les vaisseaux portant les armoiries autrefois glorieuses des von Valancius.

languages.text: Cuando la noticia de la traición de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente alcanzó a los sistemas habitados, recayó sobre la Armada el duro deber de castigar a su protectorado. Fueron ellos quienes derrotaron a la flota en órbita de Dargonus y realizaron la purga del mundo capital. Se enviaron patrullas a lo largo de la Extensión para dar caza a todas las naves que presentaran el antes glorioso escudo de los von Valancius.
languages.original_text: When the news of the Rogue Trader's betrayal reached the inhabited systems, it was the Navy's grim duty to exact retribution on the protectorate. It was they who defeated the fleet in Dargonus's orbit and carried out the purge of the capital world. All across the Expanse, patrols hunted for the ships bearing the once glorious crest of von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: Cuando la noticia de la traición de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente alcanzó a los sistemas habitados, recayó sobre la Armada el duro deber de castigar a su protectorado. Fueron ellos quienes derrotaron a la flota en órbita de Dargonus y realizaron la purga del mundo capital. Se enviaron patrullas a lo largo de la Extensión para dar caza a todas las naves que presentaran el antes glorioso escudo de los von Valancius.

languages.text: Als die Nachricht von dem Verrat {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} die besiedelten Systeme erreichte, war es die unangenehme Pflicht der Kriegsflotte, Vergeltung an dem Protektorat zu üben. Sie besiegte die Flotte im Orbit von Dargonus und führte die Reinigung der Hauptwelt durch. Überall in der Ausdehnung jagten Patrouillen die Schiffe mir dem vormals so ruhmreichen Wappen derer von Valancius.
languages.original_text: When the news of the Rogue Trader's betrayal reached the inhabited systems, it was the Navy's grim duty to exact retribution on the protectorate. It was they who defeated the fleet in Dargonus's orbit and carried out the purge of the capital world. All across the Expanse, patrols hunted for the ships bearing the once glorious crest of von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: Als die Nachricht von dem Verrat {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} die besiedelten Systeme erreichte, war es die unangenehme Pflicht der Kriegsflotte, Vergeltung an dem Protektorat zu üben. Sie besiegte die Flotte im Orbit von Dargonus und führte die Reinigung der Hauptwelt durch. Überall in der Ausdehnung jagten Patrouillen die Schiffe mir dem vormals so ruhmreichen Wappen derer von Valancius.

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in ihanetine dair haberler insan yerleşimlerinin olduğu sistemlere ulaşınca protektoranın cezasını kesme yükümlülüğü, Donanma'ya düştü. Filo, Dargonus'un yörüngesindeki filoyu yok edip başdünyayı arındırma işlemini gerçekleştirdi. Devriyeler, bir zamanlar şan ve şerefle anılan von Valancius armasını taşıyan gemileri Enginlik'in dört bir yanında avlamaya başladı.
languages.original_text: When the news of the Rogue Trader's betrayal reached the inhabited systems, it was the Navy's grim duty to exact retribution on the protectorate. It was they who defeated the fleet in Dargonus's orbit and carried out the purge of the capital world. All across the Expanse, patrols hunted for the ships bearing the once glorious crest of von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir'in ihanetine dair haberler insan yerleşkelerinin olduğu sistemlere ulaştığında, protektoranın cezasını kesme yükümlülüğü Donanma'ya düşmüştü. Dargonus'un yörüngesindeki filoyu yok eden ve başdünyayı arındırma işlemini gerçekleştiren onlardı. Devriyeler, bir zamanları şan ve şerefle anılan von Valancius armasını taşıyan gemileri Enginlik'in dört bir yanında avlamaya başladı.
